% chants of the Carmelites Discalced in Dacice
%
% common macros

\newcommand{\annotationFont}[1]{\small {\textbf{#1}}}

% annotation to be placed above the chant's initial
\newcommand{\scoreAnnotation}[2]{%
  \gresetfirstannotation{\annotationFont{#1}}%
  \gresetsecondannotation{\annotationFont{#2}}%
}

\newcommand{\scoreSpaced}[1]{
  %\vspace{5mm}
  \includescore{#1}
  \vspace{5mm}
}

\newcommand{\hourTitle}[1]{
  \vspace{5mm}
  \begin{center}
    \textbf{#1}
  \end{center}
  %\vspace{4mm}
}

\newcommand{\hourPart}[1]{
  \begin{center}
    \emph{#1}
  \end{center}
}

\newcommand{\titlePage}[4]{
  \newgeometry{left=2cm, right=1.5cm, top=2cm, bottom=0.5cm}

  \vspace*{3.5cm}

  \begin{center}
    {\large #1 } % feast rank

    \vspace{9mm}

    {\Huge #2 } % feast title  

    \vspace{25mm}

    #3 % author

    \vfill

    \includegraphics[height=2cm]{img/ocd_znak_dacice.eps}

    \vspace{5mm}

    #4 % published

    
  \end{center}

  \restoregeometry
}

\newcommand{\rubric}[1]{\small\emph{#1}}
